effect_group.help: RangedNPClimit: NPC control buff
RangedNPClimit: init in case player never equipped a range weapon b4
RangedNPClimit: sets the var that NPCs will use to self leave the party. More than one NPC follower is only allowed when the player UNequips a ranged weapon.

RangedNPClimit: when the player equips a ranged weapon, the ranged NPC follow limit is always 1. If the player is using a ranged weapon, (s)he can only have one ranged NPC follower. This is about the melee build playing style, for players that prefer playing most of the time in melee mode.

triggered_effect.help: force limit 1 at any charisma lvl

effect_group.help: MeleeNPClimit: melee allows always max (so each player can have at most 3 ranged + 3 melee followers)
